name: The Autumn of Breakups
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Kourtney Kang, Craig Gerard (executive story editor), Matthew Zinman (executive story editor), Daniel Gregor (executive story editor), Doug Mand (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: As the season of break-ups continues, Ted and Victoria must choose the next step in their long and complicated relationship. Meanwhile, Robin worries about Barney when he chooses a dog to be his wingman.
